context:
### Idiom: 听而不闻
### Meaning: ①《礼记·大学》：“心不在焉，视而不见，听而不闻，食而不知其味。”后以“听而不闻”谓听了与没听见一样，形容不重视或漠不关心。②谓听力有限，不闻声响。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by qwen-14b-chat; Corpus: wikipedia
source: 马林其后向传媒证实照片在其总理官邸拍摄，并为此道歉。她谴责中共当局侵犯新疆维吾尔人权，指利益不是对暴行听而不闻的藉口；认为乌克兰回复和平的唯一方法是令俄罗斯全面撤军，欧盟也因此应摆脱对后者石油的依赖。虽然支持芬兰加入北约，但认为国土上不应有北约永久基地甚至核武的布置。
target: Marini subsequently confirmed to the media that the photo was taken at her official residence as prime minister and apologized for it. She condemned the Chinese Communist Party for violating the human rights of the Uighurs in Xinjiang, saying that interests should not be an excuse for turning a blind eye to atrocities; she believed that the only way to restore peace in Ukraine was to completely withdraw Russian troops, and the EU should therefore break its dependence on Russian oil. Although she supports Finland joining NATO, she believes that there should be no permanent NATO bases or even nuclear weapons deployed on its territory.

context:
### Idiom: 石破天惊
### Meaning: 唐李贺《李凭箜篌引》：“女娲炼石补天处，石破天惊逗秋雨。”形容乐声高亢激越，有惊天动地之势。后多用以比喻某一事物或文章议论新奇惊人。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by mt0-13b; Corpus: cc-news
source: 伦理担忧对ChatGPT也同样存在——它已展现出‘石破天惊’的智慧化一面，对很多领域产生破坏性，比较直接的例子是有大学生用其生成论文并获得高分。不仅如此，生成式人工智慧进化速度极快，ChatGPT去（2022）年11月推出后，今年3月迭代出的GPT-4，不仅知识面更广、对答更流畅，开始能够读懂图片内容，在律师资格考试中拿下高分，而且具备自我反思的能力。
target: Also, ChatGPT has demonstrated a "surprisingly intelligent" side, which has been controversial in many fields, the most direct example of which is a student who used it to produce a paper and received a high grade. Not only that, generated AI has evolved very fast, ChatGPT was launched in November 2022, and the GPT-4, which has been updated in March of this year, has a wider knowledge base, a smoother conversation, has begun to read content, has a high rating in the lawyer's exam, and has the ability to self-reflect.

context:
### Idiom: 胸中万卷
### Meaning: 指读过大量的书。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by qwen-14b-chat; Corpus: weibo
source: 心有花满枝，漫眼尽红绯。胸中万卷图，落笔皆山河。回家时候看到杏花几乎全变得苍白——这是花要尽了。
target: In my heart, the branches are filled with flowers, and my eyes are filled with red. In my chest, there are thousands of pictures, and every stroke I write is mountains and rivers. When I got home, I saw that the apricot blossoms were almost all white - it seemed that the flowers were about to fade away.

context:
### Idiom: 遥遥无期
### Meaning: 形容达到目的、实现理想的时间还相距很远。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by alma-13b-lora; Corpus: wikipedia
source: 2014年1月15日，杨碧川出席国家人权博物馆筹备处新书发表会，他说，拿笔写历史是他唯一能表达对不义政权永远的反抗，“我们要把这个精神留做历史的见证，历史是这样写的，历史是有这么多人用性命跟青春换来，这段历史不能忘记；但忘记历史是统治者的本领，他们教我们放弃历史的思考，只让我们向前看”。2020年8月16日，杨碧川表示，他相当尊敬的已故越南民主共和国主席胡志明曾说，必须先追求越南独立，独立之后越南才有可能实践马克思主义；如果台湾人民不能抱持“一边抗战、一边建国”之理念，台湾独立遥遥无期；如果他逝世以前台湾仍未独立，他“要站著死，也不要躺著死”。详见台湾组合资料库。
target: On January 15, 2014, Yang Biyuan attended the launch of a new book by the National Human Rights Museum Preparatory Committee, saying, "The only way I can express my resistance to the unjust regime is to write history with a pen. "We must keep this spirit as a witness to history. History is written in this way. History is the result of so many people who sacrificed their lives and youth. This history cannot be forgotten; but forgetting history is the craft of the rulers. They teach us to give up the thinking of history, but only look forward. "On August 16, 2020, Yang Biyuan said, "I have a deep respect for the late Vietnamese Democratic Republic of Vietnam President Ho Chi Minh, who once said that Vietnamese must first strive for Vietnamese independence, and only after independence can Vietnamese people practice Marxism. If the Taiwanese people cannot hold the "resist and build" concept of "one hand resisting, one hand building", Taiwan's independence will be distant forever. If he died before Taiwan's independence, he "would rather stand than lie down to die". For details, please refer to the Taiwan Combined Database.

### Idiom: 缺一不可
### Meaning: 少一样也不行。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by google_api; Corpus: web
source: 一个企业拥有一个高品质的宣传片也势在必行，那么对于企业来讲，对宣传片制作了解多少呢？做好一部企业宣传片有哪些注意的呢？下面，中国电影电视网就这一问题给大家做一个简单回答。总之，一部高质量的企业宣传片由前期策划、中期拍摄以及后期制作来完成的，每一个环节都很重要，缺一不可，相辅相成的，都要求完美无瑕，这样才能制作出优秀精良的企业宣传片。其次，一部优秀的企业宣传片要给观众视觉冲击。
target: It is imperative for a company to have a high-quality promotional video. So how much does a company know about the production of promotional videos? What should you pay attention to when making a corporate promotional video? Below, China Film and Television Network will give you a simple answer to this question. In short, a high-quality corporate video is completed by pre-planning, mid-term shooting and post-production. Each link is very important and indispensable. They complement each other and must be flawless. Only in this way can an excellent and sophisticated enterprise be produced. Promotional video. Secondly, an excellent corporate video must give the audience a visual impact.

context:
### Idiom: 早出晚归
### Meaning: 早晨出去，晚上归来。谓整日在外。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by google_api; Corpus: cc-news
source: 他指平日儿子和媳妇都早出晚归，只有他们两老和两名孙女在家，他担心对方会变本加厉。不过他并没怪责男子父母，只希望警方能介入，避免再发生类似情况。
target: He pointed out that on weekdays, his son and his wife would go out early and come home late. Only their two elders and two granddaughters were at home. He was worried that the other party would get worse. However, he did not blame the man's parents and only hoped that the police could intervene to prevent similar situations from happening again.

context:
### Idiom: 抱成一团
### Meaning: 保持一致，行动起来像一个人。形容关系极为亲密。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by alma-13b-lora; Corpus: cc-news
source: 韩国首次以‘团队赛’展开的偶像选秀节目《Peak Time》，重新赋予已经出道过，却没能成功的无名宝藏男团再次获得舞台的机会。最新一集中，除了闯进前6名队伍的决战舞台之外，还有在前几回合被淘汰的男团带来的‘特别舞台’，冠军得主为‘兼差男团’的11点（原团名：VANNER），成功抱走3亿韩元（约新台币700万元）奖金、发行专辑与全球发表会的奖励，成员们在台上抱成一团痛哭，‘我们好像终于被光线照到了，一路走到这里，真的非常感谢，我们扶持彼此才能走到这个位置，我们会持续努力，直到碰触到那束光芒。
target: A new idol selection show, “Peak Time”, was launched for the first time in Korea, and gave a second chance to the boy band that had already debuted but failed to achieve success. The latest episode featured a “special stage” from the boy band that was eliminated in the early rounds, and the champion was the “part-time boy band” 11 points (Original name: VANNER), who won 3 billion won (about NT$7 million) in prize money, the opportunity to release an album and hold a global concert. The members cried on stage after hugging each other, saying, “We seem to have been in the light, and we are very grateful that we have come this far. We will continue to support each other, and we will keep trying until we touch that ray of light.

context:
### Idiom: 轶事遗闻
### Meaning: 世人不大知道的事纪传说。多指不见于正式记载的。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by alma-13b-lora; Corpus: weibo
source: 今天早晨安利给老杨。这家伙儿，刚开头就开始给我一顿输出，唠唠叨叨讲学校的久远历史、轶事遗闻。把他的话都填进去小说能变成长篇。
target: This morning, I gave it to Old Yang. This guy started talking to me about the school's long history and strange stories. If all of his words were put into the novel, it would be a long one.

context:
### Idiom: 筋疲力尽
### Meaning: 筋肉疲乏，体力竭尽。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by alma-13b-lora; Corpus: cc-news
source: 像野性的天使 ，刚筋疲力尽地。完成一场打谷——永恒是打谷完的天色——
target: Like an angel with a wild streak, just exhausted from a harvest.

context:
### Idiom: 不知就里
### Meaning: 不了解内情。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by alma-13b-lora; Corpus: cc-news
source: 在体力、时间及Budget均相当有限的情况下，Arthur与行仔的8天行程依然丰富，玩匀海陆空之余，更在制作组安排下，卖港式鸡蛋仔赚盘川，行仔全程豁出去大声叫卖，Arthur则贯彻‘迷男郎’本色迷失到底。今明播放的头两集，出发时喜气洋洋的Arthur和行仔，甫落机即被制作组强行‘开始拍摄’，完全不知就里的二人，在没有剧本及任何资讯的情况下，开始了为期8天的‘丧行’之旅。2人首个任务挑战‘豪华海景野餐’，单是寻找合适景点及食物已行到脚酸，其间更遇上猴子小偷将2人辛苦得来的驰名鸭肉‘毁掉’，令他们要‘返回起点重新出发’。
target: In limited time, energy and budget, Arthur and Xiao Hei's eight-day journey is still rich in content. While playing on land, sea and air, the production team arranged for them to sell Hong Kong-style egg tarts. Xiao Hei was allowed to shout out loud to attract customers, while Arthur was allowed to play the role of "lost boy" while wandering around. The first two episodes to be broadcast today and tomorrow will focus on the departure of Arthur and Xiao Hei. The two were forced to start filming by the production team when they arrived at the destination. Since they did not have a script or any information, the two did not know what to do. Their first mission was to challenge "luxury sea view picnic". It was not an easy task to find a suitable location and food. The two encountered a monkey that stole their hard-earned duck meat, forcing them to "start over" from the beginning.

context:
### Idiom: 打肿脸充胖子
### Meaning: 比喻宁可付出代价而硬充作了不起。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by gpt4; Corpus: cc-news
source: 不少机构在当地兴建大型数据中心，这些高科技工程虽然能在短期提拔经济，但不能为当地带来长久收入。另外，地方财政缺乏透明度，政府通过大规模转移支付和大举借债，让经济数据‘打肿脸充胖子’，只要进入偿债周期，就会面临困局。此外，贵州的经济受大陆大环境经济影响，随房地产市场下行，人口出生率负增长、城镇化速度减慢，相信土地财政会迎来更大风险。
target: Many organizations are building large data centers locally. Although these high-tech projects can boost the economy in the short term, they cannot bring long-term income to the local area. In addition, local finance lacks transparency, and the government inflates economic data by making large-scale transfer payments and borrowing heavily. Once the debt repayment cycle begins, it will face difficulties. In addition, Guizhou's economy is affected by the overall economic environment of the mainland. With the downturn in the real estate market, negative population growth, and the slowdown in urbanization, it is believed that land finance will face greater risks.

context:
### Idiom: 沆瀣一气
### Meaning: 宋钱易《南部新书》戊集载，唐代崔瀣参加科举考试，被考官崔沆录取。当时有人嘲笑说：“座主门生，沆瀣一气。”后用以喻气味相投的人联结在一起。多用于贬义。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by mt0-13b; Corpus: wikipedia
source: 学习院是贵族子弟学校，近卫的父亲近卫笃磨就是学习院的院长。后来，木户与近卫不仅始终保持着个人关系，同时还在政治上一唱一和、沆瀣一气，作为革新贵族的代表人物，成为日本政治舞台的重要角色。中学四年级的时候，木户曾参加了海军士官学校的考试，但因耳鼓膜损伤，体检未能通过。
target: 學習院 is a noble school, and Kenji's father Kenji Tsutsumi is the head of 學習院. Soon afterwards, although a political ally, Kenji and Miyako remained close friends, they became a important figure on the Japanese political scene. When Miyako was in high school, he applied for the Navy service school, but was unable to pass the exam because of a broken ear, as a representative of the progressive aristocracy.

context:
### Idiom: 随波逐尘
### Meaning: 犹言随波逐流。比喻没有坚定的立场，缺乏判断是非的能力，只能随着别人走。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by alma-13b-lora; Corpus: weibo
source: 有时候你会困于名利，有时候你会随波逐尘，你没法像李白那样，拜谒公侯的时候一边给公侯吹彩虹屁，一边又说你要是不用我，我何处皆可去。往往是几次坎坷，人就怂了，就跪了，就再也天真不起来，洒脱不起来。
target: Sometimes you will be trapped in fame and fortune, and sometimes you will be blown away by the wind. You can't be like Li Bai, who blew a rainbow fart and said, "I will go anywhere if you don't need me." Often, it is a few bumps that make people shy, kneel, and never become naive and relaxed.

context:
### Idiom: 活神活现
### Meaning: 形容生动逼真，像真的一样。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by gpt4; Corpus: cc-news
source: 贺凯教授平日省吃俭用，去世后将遗产悉数设立奖学金，嘉惠亚利桑纳州大学学习中国历史文化的学生，这是东西文化交流的一个正向繁衍。再看‘漫谈东西历史文化’的集子里，有两篇触及‘转世’的话题，首先出现的是‘转世在美国’、讲述她在课堂上及大学城的社区演讲中应邀谈‘转世’，其间遇到不少对中华文化兴趣浓厚的人士，有的曾往东亚旅游，会后发问热烈，大半听众出于好奇，还有几位坚信自己前世是中国人，其中一位女士甚至表示为了努力减肥曾叩问灵媒……，鲍教授笔尖带幽默，把这个出自东方宗教和哲学的题目借用真人真事表达，活神活现，不禁令人莞尔。诉说墨妇血泪故事。
target: Professor He Kai was frugal in his daily life, and after his death, he set up his entire estate as a scholarship to benefit students studying Chinese history and culture at the University of Arizona. This is a positive proliferation of East-West cultural exchange. Looking again at the collection 'Casual Talks on East-West History and Culture', there are two articles touching on the topic of 'reincarnation'. The first one is 'Reincarnation in America', which tells about her being invited to talk about 'reincarnation' in classroom lectures and community speeches in college towns. During this time, she encountered many people who were deeply interested in Chinese culture. Some had traveled to East Asia and asked questions enthusiastically after the meeting. Most of the audience was curious, and a few even firmly believed that they were Chinese in their previous lives. One lady even stated that she consulted a medium in an effort to lose weight... Professor Bao's writing is humorous, using real people and events to express this topic from Eastern religion and philosophy, making it vivid and amusing. She tells the tearful story of an ink woman.

context:
### Idiom: 精诚所至
### Meaning: 人的真诚的意志所到。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by google_api; Corpus: web
source: 提升自己能力。1、精诚所至，金石为开。如果对方对你很冷漠，也没必要不愉快，提升自己是关键。
target: Improve your abilities. 1. Wherever sincerity comes, gold and stone will open. If the other person is indifferent to you, there is no need to be unhappy. Improving yourself is the key.

context:
### Idiom: 推而广之
### Meaning: 广宽，大。推展开来而且把它扩大。也指从一件事情推及其它。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by alma-13b-lora; Corpus: cc-news
source: 回顾当年‘丰田质量风波’，除了国家层面上以驻日美军为标志的日美不平等关系和强力威慑之外，美方究竟是凭借什么资本逼迫丰田汽车公司，明知对方有意罗织罪名却只能俯首帖耳？推而广之，在二战后70多年来的一场又一场国际经贸争端中，美国究竟是凭借什么迫使一家又一家外国巨型企业高管忍受屈辱到美国过堂？从2009年6月就任丰田汽车公司社长（总裁）至今，在丰田章男掌舵丰田汽车公司将近14个年头，我相信这14年、甚至他此生最为屈辱的经历多半就是2010年2月在美国众议院的那次‘过堂’。
target: Looking back at the "Toyota quality scandal" of that time, in addition to the unequal and coercive relationship between Japan and the United States represented by the US military stationed in Japan, and the coercion of Toyota Motor Company by the United States, what capital did the United States use to force Toyota Motor Company to admit its guilt, knowing that it would deliberately fabricate evidence? If we put this aside, in the international economic and trade disputes of more than 70 years after World War II, what capital did the United States use to force one foreign giant enterprise after another to bear the humiliation and come to the United States to plead guilty? I believe that the most humiliating experience of Toyota Motor Company's president Akio Toyoda during his nearly 14 years at the helm of Toyota Motor Company is the experience of "coming to the US Congress" in February 2010.

context:
### Idiom: 白眼相看
### Meaning: 看别人时眼睛朝上或旁边，现出白眼珠，表示轻蔑，不屑一顾，对人不礼貌。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by alma-13b-lora; Corpus: weibo
source: 八大山人的鸟画，逸笔草草，常常一幅画就一二小鸟，单足而立，紧缩脖子，白眼相看，露出一幅不屑的傲娇表情，以此表达作者悲愤不已的心情。八大山人笔下的鸟雀并不只有瞟白眼，有的鸟儿给人感觉在静穆沉思，有的在倚梦安睡，有的作洗耳恭听状，整个画面传达出一片宁静的氛围，给人无限的想象空间。
target: Ba Yuyan's bird paintings are often a few small birds, standing on one leg, shrinking their necks, staring at each other with white eyes, showing a disdainful arrogant expression, which expresses the artist's great anger. Ba Yuyan's birds are not only staring at each other with their white eyes. Some of the birds give people the feeling of being quiet and thinking, and some are sleeping with their heads leaning on, and some are listening obediently, which gives people a sense of peace and gives them infinite imagination space.

context:
### Idiom: 苦尽甘来
### Meaning: 比喻生活经历中由苦到乐的转变。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by qwen-14b-chat; Corpus: weibo
source: 刘宇宁 “那时候的嗓子坏到只能靠药和意志力撑着”，现在也算苦尽甘来了 希望他没有塌房那一天 挑吃兔的微博视频。
target: Liu Yuning "At that time, my voice was so bad that I could only rely on medicine and willpower to hold on", and now it can be said that the bitter has passed and the sweet has come. I hope he will not have塌房那一天塌房那一天. Picked by the rabbit's Weibo video.

context:
### Idiom: 心心念念
### Meaning: 犹一心一意；念念不忘。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by mt0-13b; Corpus: cc-news
source: 对瓜地马拉的‘一中政策’欣然接受吧，可能会感觉如骨鲠在喉，实在是不情愿将台湾被称作中国。因为蔡政府心心念念的是将台湾‘去中化’，彻底割裂两岸的历史连接，压根不愿意把台湾和大陆扯上边，怎么会愿意台湾被称作‘唯一且真正的中国’呢。对瓜地马拉的‘一中政策’表示不满吧，有些说不出口，说了就会扫邦交国总统的面子。
target: Accept Guatemala's "one China" policy, it might feel like a thorn in the side, really don't want Taiwan to be called China. Because the 蔡政府's objective is to "de-China" Taiwan, breaking the historic connection between the two islands, doesn't want Taiwan to be called the "one and true China"? Disapprove Guatemala's "one China" policy, it might feel like a thorn in the side, really don't want Taiwan to be called the "one and true China"?

context:
### Idiom: 疏财仗义
### Meaning: 疏财以财物分人。讲义气，轻视钱财。多指出钱帮助遭难的人。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by gpt4; Corpus: wikipedia
source: 因在家乡打死人而逃往江州，官府捉不到人便抓了李逵兄长李达顶罪坐牢数年，因此李达对这成日惹事生非的弟弟充满怨恨；李逵到江州后得戴宗收留并收编其做手下狱卒。李逵久闻宋江疏财仗义的名号，视宋江为偶像。宋江因犯重罪被发配江州，吴用写信让戴宗照应，经由戴宗引荐让李逵与宋江结识，宋江见李逵体格粗壮、性格耿直，十分欢喜。
target: Having fled to Jiangzhou after killing a man in his hometown, the authorities couldn't capture Li Kui and instead arrested his elder brother, Li Da, who was sentenced to several years in prison. As a result, Li Da harbored resentment towards his trouble-making younger brother. After arriving in Jiangzhou, Li Kui was taken in by Dai Zong, who enlisted him as a prison guard. Li Kui had long admired Song Jiang for his generosity and righteousness, considering him a role model. When Song Jiang was exiled to Jiangzhou for serious crimes, Wu Yong wrote a letter asking Dai Zong to look after him. Through Dai Zong's introduction, Li Kui met Song Jiang. Song Jiang was very pleased with Li Kui's robust physique and honest character.

context:
### Idiom: 愧不敢当
### Meaning: 感到惭愧，承当不起。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by mt0-13b; Corpus: web
source: 而现在，洪三竟然要将这些东西送给自己，这份礼也着实太大了。“三爷以后就直接叫我名字吧，神医二字愧不敢当。”顿了顿后，秦阳抬头看向了洪三，认真的说道。
target: And now, Hongmei actually gave these things to him, it was a very big present. "Mr. Hongmei, from now on you can just call my name, the word "Master" is too difficult to carry." After a moment, Qin Yang looked up at Hongmei, and said very sincerely.

### Idiom: 不知所错
### Meaning: 错错开；处置。不知道怎么办才好。形容处境为难或心神慌乱。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by alma-13b-lora; Corpus: web
source: 从放开后的自由，到完全放手的不适应，再到现在很多人不知所错的现状。
target: From the freedom after the release to the inappropriateness of complete freedom, and now to the present situation where many people do not know what they are doing.

### Idiom: 疏财仗义
### Meaning: 疏财以财物分人。讲义气，轻视钱财。多指出钱帮助遭难的人。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by qwen-14b-chat; Corpus: wikipedia
source: 因在家乡打死人而逃往江州，官府捉不到人便抓了李逵兄长李达顶罪坐牢数年，因此李达对这成日惹事生非的弟弟充满怨恨；李逵到江州后得戴宗收留并收编其做手下狱卒。李逵久闻宋江疏财仗义的名号，视宋江为偶像。宋江因犯重罪被发配江州，吴用写信让戴宗照应，经由戴宗引荐让李逵与宋江结识，宋江见李逵体格粗壮、性格耿直，十分欢喜。
target: Li Kui, who had killed someone in his hometown and fled to Jiangzhou, was not caught by the officials, so they arrested Li Da, his elder brother, to take the blame and sentenced him to several years in prison. As a result, Li Da was full of resentment towards this brother who caused trouble every day. After Li Kui arrived in Jiangzhou, Dai Zong took him in and recruited him as a prison guard under his command. Li Kui had long heard of Song Jiang's reputation for being generous and righteous, and regarded Song Jiang as his idol. Song Jiang was sentenced to be exiled to Jiangzhou because of a serious crime. Wu Yong wrote a letter to Dai Zong to take care of him, and through Dai Zong's introduction, Li Kui and Song Jiang met. Song Jiang was very happy when he saw that Li Kui was strong and straightforward.

context:
### Idiom: 虹销雨霁
### Meaning: 虹彩虹；销同消”，消失；霁本指雨止，也引申为天气放睛。彩虹消失，雨后天睛。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by gpt4; Corpus: web
source: 余干县博物馆开展“国际古迹遗址日”宣传活动。安阳殷墟博物馆在4月18日为积极响应国际遗址日的号召，特别推出了以“静看商朝的虹销雨霁”为主题的线上课程。本次活动通过现场发放《文物保护法律法规》及文物知识普及宣传资料、悬挂宣传条幅、开展相关文物法律及法规咨询服务等形式，向广大市民群众进行文物的保护知识、文化遗产相关法律的科普宣传。
target: The Yugan County Museum launched a publicity campaign for "International Day for Monuments and Sites". In response to the call for International Sites Day on April 18, the Anyang Yin Ruins Museum specially launched an online course themed "Watching the Rainbow Disappear after the Rain in the Shang Dynasty". This event disseminated knowledge about the protection of cultural relics and related laws to the general public through various means, such as distributing "Cultural Relics Protection Laws and Regulations" and popularizing promotional materials, hanging promotional banners, and providing related cultural relics legal and regulatory consulting services.

context:
### Idiom: 随波逐尘
### Meaning: 犹言随波逐流。比喻没有坚定的立场，缺乏判断是非的能力，只能随着别人走。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by google_api; Corpus: weibo
source: 有时候你会困于名利，有时候你会随波逐尘，你没法像李白那样，拜谒公侯的时候一边给公侯吹彩虹屁，一边又说你要是不用我，我何处皆可去。往往是几次坎坷，人就怂了，就跪了，就再也天真不起来，洒脱不起来。
target: Sometimes you will be trapped in fame and fortune, and sometimes you will follow the crowd. You can't be like Li Bai, who blows rainbow farts to the prince when he pays homage to the prince, and at the same time says that if you don't use me, I can do it anywhere. go. Often, after a few ups and downs, people become intimidated and kneel down, and they can no longer be innocent or free and easy.

context:
### Idiom: 无往不胜
### Meaning: 无论到哪儿没有不胜利的。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by alma-13b-lora; Corpus: weibo
source: “告我地球同胞，敌人没有无往不胜的锋锐，并非无可战胜之神，但有我浩然军魂一息尚存，必与这些数典忘祖之辈血战到底，以安我同胞生者之心，慰我同胞死者之灵。” “我等愿身化飞灰，扬于百万星河。
target: Tell my fellow earthlings that the enemy has neither invincible sharpness nor invincible gods, but I have a heroic military spirit that will fight to the end, so that I can calm my fellow earthlings who are still alive, and comfort those who are dead.

### Idiom: 如人饮水，冷暖自知
### Meaning: 泛指自己经历的事，自己知道甘苦。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by mt0-13b; Corpus: web
source: 如人饮水，冷暖自知吧，大家其实现在是要盘点自己的债务情况。
target: As men drink, so do men know. Everyone is really trying to figure out their own debt situation.

context:
### Idiom: 听而不闻
### Meaning: ①《礼记·大学》：“心不在焉，视而不见，听而不闻，食而不知其味。”后以“听而不闻”谓听了与没听见一样，形容不重视或漠不关心。②谓听力有限，不闻声响。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by qwen-14b-chat; Corpus: wikipedia
source: 2022年4月24日，华视新闻资讯台《华视午间新闻》被爆废公社率先揭发，报导《美丽岛电子报》调查中华民国总统蔡英文施政满意度56%新闻，图卡将行政院院长苏贞昌职衔误植为“总统”；同日，华视发布道歉启事，表示“因制图同仁疏失”而将苏贞昌职衔误植为“总统”，并向观众致歉。中国国民党立法委员李德维批评，民主进步党遇到自己人出事，就视而不见、听而不闻；NCC变成瞎子与聋子，如同面对镜电视，沦为民进党附属机构。2022年4月25日，监察委员赖鼎铭、叶宜津、林郁容联合新闻稿指出，华视新闻资讯台字幕跑马灯多次发布不实新闻，造成社会不安；本案是单纯标准作业程序（SOP）疏失或其他系统性、结构性问题，文化部与NCC有无善尽督导之责，三人已申请自动调查。
target: On April 24, 2022, it was reported by废公社 that the "Huashetv Midday News" on Huashetv News and Information Channel revealed that the "Beautiful Island Electronic Newsletter" had conducted a survey of President Tsai Ing-wen's approval rating in the Republic of China, and that the title card had mistakenly labeled the Premier as "President". On the same day, Huashetv issued an apology, stating that "due to the negligence of map-making colleagues," the title card had mistakenly labeled the Premier as "President" and apologized to the audience. Legislative Yuan member Li De-wei of the Democratic Progressive Party criticized that when their own people were involved, they turned a blind eye and deaf ear, and that the NCC had become blind and deaf, like a mirror TV facing the public, and had become an affiliated agency of the Democratic Progressive Party. On April 25, 2022, Supervisory Committee members Lai Ding-ming, Ye Yi-jin, and Lin Yu-jung jointly issued a press release stating that the Huashetv News and Information Channel's ticker had repeatedly released false news, causing social unrest. This case was simply due to a failure in standard operating procedures (SOP) or other systemic and structural issues, and whether the Ministry of Culture and the NCC had fulfilled their supervisory responsibilities was under investigation by the three.

source: 想来 真诚才是必杀技 在这恢诡谲怪的商场 这股清流 方能撼动困局。
target: It seems that sincerity is the ultimate skill in this unpredictable and strange business world, only this fresh stream can break the deadlock.

### Idiom: 碌碌无奇
### Meaning: 平凡，无特殊才能。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by google_api; Corpus: wikipedia
source: 2023年1月，《血之辙》的实体与电子单行本合计销售量突破200万。主人公长部静一是一位碌碌无奇的普通中二生，尽管表面上与其母亲静子的关系很好，但后者明显对其儿子保护过度。暑假期间，长部家和亲戚一起去爬山。
target: In January 2023, the combined sales volume of physical and electronic single copies of "Blood Trail" exceeded 2 million. The protagonist, Nagabe Shizuichi, is an ordinary middle school student. Although he has a good relationship with his mother Shizuko on the surface, the latter is obviously overprotective of his son. During the summer vacation, the Nagabe family went hiking with relatives.
